title: Ticket #3376: default value for SBIN and LIBEXEC params are wrong on Windows
description:
The param table default values for LIBEXEC and SBIN use *nix appropriate values even on Windows. This means that if you don't define these config knobs in your config value, HTCondor will not work.

Since it's possible to have win32_default values as well as default values in param_info.in, we should set Windows appropriate defaults for these knobs.
